mapper.sql: a.id , a.card_type_id as "cardTypeId", a.card_id as "cardId", a.card_name as "cardName", a.card_serial_no as "cardSerialNo", a.card_no as "cardNo", a.card_password as "cardPassword", a.card_money as "cardMoney", a.activation_code as "activationCode", a.activation_code_use_status as "activationCodeUseStatus", a.activation_code_use_uid as "activationCodeUseUid", a.activation_code_use_time as "activationCodeUseTime", a.card_activation_status as "cardActivationStatus", a.card_activation_time as "cardActivationTime", a.card_use_status as "cardUseStatus", a.card_use_uid as "cardUseUid", a.card_use_time as "cardUseTime", a.remark , a.begin_time as "beginTime", a.end_time as "endTime", a.batch_no as "batchNo", a.application_id as "applicationId", a.create_by as "createBy", a.update_by as "updateBy", a.create_time as "createTime", a.update_time as "updateTime"
mapper.select: select ,r.company_id as "groupId",r.application_status as "applicationStatus" from ad_voucher_card_record a join ad_voucher_card_application_record r on a.application_id = r.id where a.activation_code = #{code} and a.card_activation_status !=3

SELECT a.id , a.card_no as "cardNo", a.card_password as "cardPassword", a.card_money as "cardMoney", a.card_use_uid as "cardUseUid", a.card_use_time as "cardUseTime" from ad_voucher_card_record a where a.card_use_uid=#{userId} and a.card_use_status =1 and a.activation_code_use_status=1 order by a.card_use_time desc LIMIT #{startIndex},#{pageSize}
SELECT count(0) from ad_voucher_card_record a where a.card_use_uid=#{userId} and a.card_use_status =1 and card_activation_status=1 and a.activation_code_use_status=1

SELECT ,r.company_id as "groupId",r.application_status as "applicationStatus" from ad_voucher_card_record a join ad_voucher_card_application_record r on a.application_id = r.id where a.card_password=#{cardPassword}
mapper.update: UPDATE ad_voucher_card_record set activation_code_use_status = #{activationCodeUseStatus}, card_use_uid= #{cardUseUid}, card_use_mobile= #{cardUseMobile}, card_use_status= #{cardUseStatus}, card_use_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
